metadata.title: CVE-2020-35480 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.1. Missing users (accountsthat don't exist) and hidden users (accounts that have been explicitlyhidden due to being abusive, or similar) that the viewer cannot see arehandled differently, exposing sensitive information about the hidden statusto unprivileged viewers. This exists on various code paths.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
